Name: Surrounded by mice
About the game: This is a RPG role-playing game Turn-based battle Woke up, the family entered a big mouse, and still eat people Not only did the family enter the big mouse, but the whole village was invaded by the mouse. Must eliminate the mouse Equipment system Equipment is divided into weapons, shields, heads, clothes, decorations 5 quality levels As long as you have money, you can buy it. Prop system As long as you have money, you can buy medicines in the item store. Can recover HP after use The medicine is divided into 5 quality grades. Magic system The protagonist has magic, using magic can cause more damage to the enemy. Need to consume a small amount of MP Upgrade can learn new magic Monster system When moving on a wild map, there is a probability to trigger a fight After defeating the monster, you can gain experience, money
Meta Title: Surrounded by mice: May 16, 2019, yang zhi and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Surrounded by mice? Check out the release date (May 16, 2019), developer insights from yang zhi, and a complete game summary.
